description: Enhance Recent Activity card to show meaningful metadata for ALL scraper types instead of just generic "X rows updated" messages
goal: Users can see what was actually scraped (weeks, teams, types) in the Recent Activity card for all table types
requirements: Show week ranges for game-related tables (games, live_plays, live_drives, win_probability)
Show video_type counts for game_videos (e.g., '90 highlights')
Aggregate metadata from batch updates (not just 5 rows)
Display contextual descriptions like '90 highlights (Weeks 5-11)' instead of '90 rows updated'
constraints: Keep performance reasonable (don't fetch entire tables)
